'Hybrid' is a downloadable third-person shooter video game released on August 8,
2012 for Xbox Live Arcade. It was developed by Bellevue, Washington-based 5th
Cell, the creative studio behind the [[Scribblenauts]] series, [[Drawn to Life]]
series, and [[Lock's Quest]]. Utilizing the Source game engine from Valve
Corporation, this is the first Xbox 360 title from developer 5th
Cell.
categories: Video games developed in the United States
